programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Iris continues to consider the possibility that Basti is gay. When the rumor spreads and reaches him, a fed-up Ali confronts Iris and breaks up with her. Later, Basti is stunned to hear his own heartbeat while comforting Iris.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Isabelle and the other survivors of Barrio Sto. Francisco mourn their fallen neighbors. They later hold a funeral and discuss where they will relocate. Meanwhile, Franco gets caught in a shootout between the rebels and the military. Much to the dismay of Rhian, some of the children who joined the rebels were injured in the encounter.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Franco tails Rhian to confirm his hunch about her. However, Rhian senses that he is following her on her way to Isabelle and Elai's location. Wanting to protect the two, Rhian goes out of her way to keep them from Franco. Meanwhile, Jessie tries to find out what Rhian is hiding. Elsewhere, Tiago offers to help Corazon solve Arabella's case.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Daniela finds herself in a bind after Carlos discovers her suspicious transactions. Afraid to be exposed, she scrambles to find a way to cover up her secrets. Meanwhile, the kidnapper's call keeps haunting Romina and triggers her most painful memories. Instead of cowering in fear, she finally decides to seek the justice she truly deserves. Cassie struggles to move on from the traumatic events that happened to her and her family as Marga continues to give her a hard time.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Robert decides to throw a birthday party once again for Cassie. Daniela disapproves and convinces her father to host a party for Marga instead, insisting that her daughter is the real Mondragon. In order to be fair and equal, Robert chooses to hold a double birthday celebration for the girls. Marga rejects this and becomes jealous of Cassie for taking the spotlight away from her. The tension between Romina and Daniela intensifies.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: A year after Waldo's disappearance at sea, Aryann crosses paths with Tristan as she begins a new life in Manila. Unbeknownst to her, Waldo is still alive.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Fate plays its card when Aryann unexpectedly meets Waldo, who turns out to be Tristan's scholar. Later, Tristan decides to take his relationship with Aryann to the next level.

programme.title: Always
programme.desc: An ex-boxer falls in love with a blind woman who is set to undergo surgery to restore her sight.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Cassie is delighted to see a new side of Marga. Marga, on the other hand, is surprised when Daniela commands her to get on Cassie's good side. Later, Marga urges Cassie to accompany her in hanging out with her former friends. Meanwhile, Carlos gets a chance to talk to Romina and try to make amends to her.

programme.title: Mahal Kita, Beksman
programme.desc: Dali's life as a make-up artist and fashion designer, is happy and gay. But when he falls in love - surprise! He's straight.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Together with Basti, Ali and Iris spend a day in Mykonos. However, their getaway takes an unexpected turn when Ali confesses his feelings for Basti to Iris.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Though still in pain, Iris forgives Ali. Just as Ali finally finds the courage to tell Basti the truth, Basti confesses his feelings for Iris.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian manages to send Isabelle and Elai to a safe refuge. She then tries to regain Tiago's trust by expressing her interest in joining their operation. Later, Rhian gets an unexpected invitation from Jessie. Meanwhile, an encounter with a suspicious man puts Isabelle's safety at risk. Elsewhere, Marcial meets up with his adversary.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Tiago learns that Marcial is pursuing a military operation involving Avilon Land Corporation. Alarmed by Marcial's rigorous investigation, the crime syndicate leader orders Franco to transfer Pascal to another location. Rhian joins Tiago's firearms smuggling operation in hopes of finding a lead on Pascal's whereabouts.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: After being reminded by Daniela to show good graces, Marga cannot help but feel jealous of Cassie during their double birthday celebration. Romina, meanwhile, is now determined to reopen her case. Because of this, Daniela worries that she might get in trouble. Kulas, on the other hand, does everything he can to prevent the truth from coming out. Robert conducts an investigation of his own upon learning that Daniela supposedly used her family's savings for the company's projects.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: A bunch of comments ridiculing Marga pops up on social media after the party. Afraid to lose her status in school, the young Mondragon takes her anger out on Cassie and humiliates her in front of their classmates. However, karma works fast and bites her in the back. Meanwhile, Romina takes matters into her own hands and looks for evidence to support her case. Daniela, on the other hand, rushes to cover up her tracks.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Aryann continues to push Waldo out of her life for the sake of her relationship with Tristan. Soon, Waldo runs into a mishap while working on their company's ship engine.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Tristan and Aryann investigate to clear Waldo's name from the incident on the ship. The two face a new challenge in their relationship when Tristan's ex-wife Jenna returns to their lives.

programme.title: Mahal Kita, Beksman
programme.desc: Dali's life as a make-up artist and fashion designer, is happy and gay. But when he falls in love - surprise! He's straight.

programme.desc: Together with Basti, Ali and Iris spend a day in Mykonos. However, their getaway takes an unexpected turn when Ali confesses his feelings for Basti to Iris.

programme.title: Till I Met You

Rhian joins Tiago's firearms smuggling operation in hopes of finding a lead on Pascal's whereabouts.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: On her last day in the country, Anna bids farewell to her loved ones, including Paco. She later discovers something that may link to her father's death. Paco, on the other hand, relays Rizalina's findings concerning Edward's murder case to Atty. Vega.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: After receiving a scholarship by surprise, Domeng makes good use of his unused tuition fee by helping a good friend. Anna's discovery, which she feels has something to do with her father's death, prompts her to stay in the country for good.

programme.desc: After being reminded by Daniela to show good graces, Marga cannot help but feel jealous of Cassie during their double birthday celebration.
